name: Small Plate Panic
description:
You're super hungry.....good thing you just stepped into a small plate restaurant!! Eat as much food as you can before you get too full!

Use the mouse to click and select your food to play the games. The mini games include:

  • Make Sushi!
    • Select the right ingredients to make the piece of sushi shown
  • Season your Spaghetti!
    • Time your "seasoning" right by lining up the meter with the target and clicking on the mouse when they are aligned
  • Saw a slice of meat!
    • Rapidly drag the mouse across the targets to saw the meat
